title: Afghanistan: Opium cultivation up nearly a third, warns UNODC
description: The 2022 opium crop in Afghanistan is the most profitable in years with cultivation up by nearly a third amid soaring prices, and despite the multiple humanitarian and economic crises facing the country and itâ€™s Taliban rulers, said the UN Office on Drugs and Crime (UNODC) on Tuesday.
source: UN News - Global perspective Human stories
